languagemodel.calc

Interface ProbabilityCalculation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MaximumFrequencyEstimation

    public interface ProbabilityCalculation
    Blueprint for a probability calculation, where a PathHandler with the task description is used to calculate the n-gram probability.

    A class of implementing this interface should provide (at least) two kinds of its main calculation method: One sequential and one parallel.

    Author:
    Dennis Ulmer
